column4: is ubuntuforums.org experencing "database error" for anyone else...? Something in the source about too many connections to the DB....
they keep giving me that error too. I'm sure they're working on it. They changed their stuff and are probably experiencing a few teething troubles.
I got through after a few refreshes...looks like the board provider needs to migrate to persistent db conncetions
they just froze me out again... go figure.
